body: I just realized that the latest version of `sympy` that comes with spack is pretty old already. These are all versions `spack checksum  py-sympy` can find plus removing the pre-releases that were inbetween. Minimum python versions have changed for the different releases as well, so I tried to encode that with different `depends_on` clauses for the different version (ranges).
title: py-sympy: Add new versions and python versions they work with
